inclusion.criterion: SCI of at least 3 months duration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Estimated time to complete recruitment: Averaging 53 weeks, approximately 12 months
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to understand and respond to the provided questionnaires
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Crohn ́s disease or other bowel conditions
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and recurrent UTIs. They have multiple comorbidities including non-hodgkins Marginal Zone Lymphoma, Bells Palsy, BPH, Hypertension, Partial Bowel obstruction s/p colostomy, Hepatitis C, Cryoglobulinemia, SLE with transverse myelitis, and Insulin Dependant Diabetic. They also have a history of Fungal Esophagitis Stage IV and Urinary Tract Infections-pseudomonas & enterococcus.
